detailedMessages.message: Expressions that query 'inboundProperties' from the message should instead query the message 'attributes'. Remove this component if there are no uses of 'inboundProperties' in expressions or components that rely on 'inboundProperties' (such as 'copy-properties').
Use the inline configuration of the operation instead of relying on properties set before this endpoint.
Instead of using outbound properties in the flow, move the expression that sets the property into the XML attribute (such as 'method') of the operation or listener that accepts the expression.
Instead of using outbound properties in the flow, move the expression that sets the property into the XML attribute (such as 'method') of the operation or listener that accepts the expression.
You can remove this if this flow is not using 'sessionVariables' or after migrating them to variables.
